abstract: DealBook Online; Europcar has requested permission from regulators in France for initial public offering on Euronext; company says it wants to raise $75 million euros, around $528 million.
lead_paragraph: The French rental car company said in a statement that it hoped to raise about $528 million by listing shares on Euronext this year.

headline.main: Europcar Seeks Regulators’ Approval for I.P.O. in Paris

snippet: The French rental car company said in a statement that it hoped to raise about $528 million by listing shares on Euronext this year.
